steps.name: a web browser is on the Register Page

elements.name: Register a user with empty data

steps.name: click to Register button
First name error message is displayed "First name is required."
Last name error message is displayed "Last name is required."
Email error message is displayed "Email is required."
Password error message is displayed "Password is required."
Confirm password error message is displayed "Password is required."
a web browser is on the Register Page

elements.name: Register a user with invalid email

steps.name: enter "abc#123" to Email text box
click to Register button
Email error message is displayed "Wrong email"
a web browser is on the Register Page

elements.name: Register a user with valid data

steps.name: enter to Your Personal Details form with data
click to Register button
